captions.001: On the old railway bridge a footpath is mounted with rusty iron plates. They tryed to weld a banister along the path, but it makes no use. It's ramshackle.
captions.004: The maintenance carriage looks like it could use some maintenance... Just like the bridge.
captions.005: It is a beautiful old bridge.
captions.007: On this picture I crossed the bridge. These bridges span the water-meadows. In the far distance you can see the Altrheinbridge.
